availability.p: For internal use by the Faclair na Gàidhlig/DASG projects

msItem.title: Materia Medica
msItem.explicit: ... neach doghabh hé an Gaidheilcc. F.i.n.i.t. Amen. Misi Gilla Coluim.

note.p: The second word is simply ".m." in the MS, which has been expanded as "Muire" above. However, O'Connor (2020) has "mathgamna" based on other manuscripts.
